title: Identifying $$y$$, $$b$$, and $$x$$
text: The first step is to examine the equation $$y=log$$ base $$b$$ of $$x$$ and identify $$y$$, $$b$$, and $$x$$.
speech: The first step is to examine the equation  y is equal to log  base  b  of  x  and identify  y ,  b , and  x .

title: Rewriting the Equation
text: Next, rewrite the equation $$"y=log$$ base $$b$$ of x" as $$b^y=x$$.
speech: Next, rewrite the equation  quotation mark y is equal to, log  base  b  of x" as  b to the y-th is equal to x .

of x" as   b to the y-th is equal to x

title: Meaning of log
text: When there is no base indicated, log means "log base 10."
speech: When there is no base indicated, log means "log base 10."
pacedSpeech: When there is no base indicated, log means "log base 10."
